data.name: ConnectionManagerUnreachable
data.value: Video feed unavailable because connection manager is unreachable.

data.name: DeviceConnectionFailed
data.value: Unable to connect to the device. An error occurred during connection.

data.name: DeviceInvalidCredentials
data.value: Invalid user name or password.

data.name: DeviceSdkMissing
data.value: The manufacturer's SDK for this driver is not installed.

data.name: DeviceUnavailable
data.value: Connection to the device was refused. The IP address or port for the device may be incorrect.

data.name: DeviceUnreachable
data.value: The device address (IP or host) cannot be reached.

data.name: ErrorNotFound
data.value: An error message could not be found for the problem that occurred.

data.name: ExportVideoDeviceUnavailable
data.value: Video could not be exported because connection to the device was refused. The IP address or port for the device may be incorrect.

data.name: ExportVideoDeviceUnreachable
data.value: Video could not be exported because the device address (IP or host) cannot be reached.

data.name: ExportVideoError
data.value: Video could not be exported because an error occurred during the export procedure.

data.name: ExportVideoIncorrectCredentials
data.value: Video could not be exported because the user name or password is incorrect.

data.name: ExportVideoRecordingNotAvailable
data.value: Video could not be exported because recorded video is not available for the selected time.

data.name: ExportVideoSdkMissing
data.value: Video could not be exported because the manufacturer's SDK for this driver is not installed.

data.name: LiveVideoCameraNotConnected
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because the camera is not connected to a video server in IPSecurityCenter.

data.name: LiveVideoDeviceUnavailable
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because a connection to the video server was refused. The IP address or port for the device may be incorrect.

data.name: LiveVideoDeviceUnreachable
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because the device address (IP or host) cannot be reached.

data.name: LiveVideoFeedLost
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because the video feed has been lost.

data.name: LiveVideoFeedNotAvailable
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because a live feed is not available for this camera.

data.name: LiveVideoInvalidCredentials
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because the user name or password is incorrect.

data.name: LiveVideoMaxConnectionsReached
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because the maximum number of connections to the device has been reached.

data.name: LiveVideoNotSupported
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because live video is not supported by this camera.

data.name: LiveVideoSdkMissing
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because the manufacturer's SDK for this driver is not installed.

data.name: LiveVideoServerIncompatible
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because the video server is not compatible with this driver.

data.name: RecordedVideoCameraNotConnected
data.value: Recorded video could not be displayed for this camera because the camera is not connected to a video server in IPSecurityCenter.

data.name: RecordedVideoDeviceUnavailable
data.value: Live video could not be displayed for this camera because a connection to the video server was refused. The IP address or port for the device may be incorrect.

data.name: RecordedVideoDeviceUnreachable
data.value: Recorded video could not be displayed for this camera because the device address (IP or host) cannot be reached.

data.name: RecordedVideoFeedLost
data.value: Recorded video could not be displayed for this camera because the video feed has been lost.

data.name: RecordedVideoFeedNotAvailable
data.value: Recorded video could not be displayed for this camera because recorded video is not available for this camera.

data.name: RecordedVideoInvalidCredentials
data.value: Recorded video could not be displayed for this camera because the user name or password is incorrect.

data.name: RecordedVideoMaxConnectionsReached
data.value: Recorded video could not be displayed for this camera because the maximum number of connections to the device has been reached.

data.name: RecordedVideoNotSupported
data.value: Recorded video could not be displayed for this camera because recorded video is not supported by this camera.

data.name: RecordedVideoSdkMissing
data.value: Recorded video could not be displayed for this camera because the manufacturer's SDK for this driver is not installed.

data.name: RecordedVideoServerIncompatble
data.value: Recorded video could not be displayed for this camera because the video server is not compatible with this driver.

data.name: VideoFeedNotAvailable
data.value: Video feed could not be displayed.
